GSD.description:
xen/netfront: harden netfront against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.259 by commit 4bf81386e3d6e5083c93d51eff70260bcec091bb. For more details please see the references link.
